Developer Terms of Use
des:
Important! This skill is for Kirsch Automation III shades only. If you have Kirsch Automation II shades, use the Kirsch Automation skill. 

To get started, please ensure you have the proper hardware and accessories. Please contact an authorized Kirsch dealer if you have any questions.

Kirsch Automation for Amazon Alexa merges seamlessly to bring enhanced operation of popular Kirsch window coverings to your connected lifestyle.
 
Kirsch Automation for Amazon Alexa allows you to voice-activate individual shades, Rooms of shades, or specific Automation Scenes created in the Kirsch Automation App.

Simply speak “Alexa" followed by the activation words "Activate", "Open", or "Close", and then the shade name, Room, or Scene name.

Some example phrases are:

Individual Shade Command Examples
"Alexa, Open Bedroom Left."

 “Alexa, Set Kitchen Right tilt to 50 percent.”

Room Command Examples
"Alexa, Close Living Room."

Scene Command Examples
"Alexa, Activate I'm Leaving."
“Alexa, Run Movie Night.” 

Below are some tips for success when voice-activating Kirsch Automation using the Kirsch Automation III skill for Alexa:

- Make sure Shade names, Rooms, and Scene names are unique
- Make your Shade names, Rooms, and Scene names easy to pronounce
- Use Routines to combine multiple shades, Rooms of shades, or specific Kirsch Automation Scenes with other devices for whole-home automation

In order to use the Kirsch Automation skill for Alexa to voice-activate your Automation shades, you'll need the following:

Account Requirements: Kirsch Automation Account with a Kirsch Gateway (account setup and gateway setup in the Kirsch Automation app). This ensures seamless account linking with Alexa. 

For more information on Kirsch Automation visit: www.kirsch.com
